title: Com Hem - Wikipedia
snippet: Founded in 1983 as Televerket Kabel-TV as part of the former state-owned Televerket, the company was successively named Svenska Kabel-TV AB and Telia InfoMedia TeleVision AB, before becoming 'Com Hem' (a play on the Swedish phrase Kom hem, "come home") in 1999.

title: Com Hem
snippet: EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003.

title: Hem - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
snippet: The company's operation is limited to the US and Europe. It was created as a pivot out of the Fab.com, while carrying the funding, investors, and valuation of latter. ... Hem got acquired by Vitra on Feb 03, 2016.

title: BC Partners to acquire Com Hem | Carlyle
snippet: Carlyle and Providence acquired Com Hem from EQT in 2006 and, in the same year, they acquired UPC, which was integrated with Com Hem. Under the ownership of Carlyle and Providence, the company has invested nearly SEK 4 billion on developing the company, upgrading the network to the highest ...
